sentences.en: 'What the devil do you do in that galley there?'
sentences.cn: “你钻到那旮旯里搞什么鬼呀? ”

sentences.en: A four - oared galley is hovering about.
sentences.cn: 一艘四桨的小艇,在四下游弋.

sentences.en: And galley equipments , stainless steel furniture are also in our product catalogue.
sentences.cn: 主要生产空气帽、伸缩结头、滤器、泥箱 、 不锈钢(厨房)家具等船舶福建.

sentences.en: Galley and laundry equipment to be done function.
He dived out of the galley door.
He sometimes mounted thus even to the roof of the galley prison.
sentences.cn: 有时,他还用那种方法直上监狱的房顶.

sentences.en: Mugridge was back in the galley, he became greasily radiant.
sentences.cn: 茂格立治回到厨房里来, 满面是小人得志的神气.

sentences.en: On its way to the standing - galley Tilbury's notice got pied.
sentences.cn: 提尔伯里的讣告字版送到备用架上的时候,被弄乱了.

sentences.en: Reader'proof: A galley proof used by the printer's proofreader.
sentences.cn: 毛稿样: 给厂内校对员用的长条稿样.

sentences.en: The crew of the galley righted her with great speed.
sentences.cn: 划艇的人很快把小艇稳住了.

sentences.en: The fire extinguishers are stored in the galley.
sentences.cn: 灭火器存放在船上的厨房里。

sentences.en: The man hit him as he could and knocked galley - west.
sentences.cn: 那人向他使劲猛击,把他打翻在地.

sentences.en: The stewardess will get you some water from the galley.
sentences.cn: 空中小姐会从厨房给你拿些水来.

sentences.en: Thomas Mugrideg popped out of his galley like a jack - in - the - box.
sentences.cn: 汤玛斯·茂格立治 从厨房里一跃而出,象是装在盒子里的弹簧人一般.

sentences.en: Thomas Mugridge popped out of his galley like a jack - in - the - box.
sentences.cn: 汤玛斯?茂格立治从厨房里一跃而出,象是装在盒子里的弹簧人一般.

sentences.en: To repair cooking stove and tile the floor of galley.
sentences.cn: 修理炉灶,厨房地板铺瓷砖.

words.tran_cn: 十五，十六世纪西班牙大型帆船
[船]船上的厨房；单层甲板的大帆船；[印刷]活版盘，长条校样

trans.tran_cn: 单层甲板大帆船，军舰舰长用的大划艇，（船舰，飞机上的）厨房，活版盘，长条校样
